article.title: Horus Vision Receives Navy Contract for Maintenance and Support of Scout Sniper Observation Telescope
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Horus Vision LLC is being awarded a not-to-exceed ceiling $49 million firm-fixed-price, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract by the U.S. Navy for the procurement, delivery, maintenance and logistical support of the Scout Sniper Observation Telescope.
